Class HelpMojo

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
public class HelpMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

Display help information on 'org.apache.james:maven-mailetdocs-plugin' plugin. Call 'mvn mailetdocs:help -Ddetail=true' to display all details.

repeat

private static java.lang.String repeat(java.lang.String str,
                                       int repeat)

Repeat a String n times to form a new string.

Parameters:
str - String to repeat
repeat - number of times to repeat str
Returns:
String with repeated String
Throws:
java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException - if repeat < 0
java.lang.NullPointerException - if str is null

toLines

private static java.util.List toLines(java.lang.String str)

Give a list of lines for the str. Each line is indented by 4 spaces and has a maximum of 80 characters.

Parameters:
str - String to split in lines
Returns:
List of lines
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if str is null

toLines

private static java.util.List toLines(java.lang.String str,
                                      java.lang.String indent,
                                      int size)

Give a list of lines for the str. Each line is indented by indent and has a maximum of size characters.

Parameters:
str - String to split in lines
indent - the string to precede each line
size - the size of the character display buffer
Returns:
List of lines
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size < 0
java.lang.NullPointerException - if str is null
